body:
#### PR description:

* Use material properties from an XML file definition if they are different then a default ROOT material properties

#### PR validation:

```
cmsRun SimG4Core/DD4hepGeometry/test/python/testG4Geometry.py
```

no back port is needed
title: DD4hep: Material Conversion
